text: Curtie and the Boombox was Duch pop group. The group scoring chart successes during the mid 1980s. Famous songs recorded by the group are Black Kisses (Never Make You Blue) and Let's Talk it over in the Ladies Room. ==Discography== ===Albums=== *Black Kisses - 1985 *Curtie and the Boombox - 1985 ===Singles and EP records=== *Let's Talk it over in the Ladies Room - 1984 *Black Kisses (Never Make You Blue) - 1985 *Chinchilla - 1985 *A Bachelor's Bed (Is A Dangerous Place) - 1985 *Killing Love - 1986 == References == ==Other websites== *Discogs Category:Dutch musical groups
title: Curtie and the Boombox
